breakfast.name: Eggs and Toast
breakfast.portions: 3 large eggs (150g), 2 slices whole wheat bread (50g)

breakfast.name: Oatmeal with Protein Powder
breakfast.portions: 1 cup dry oats (80g), 1 scoop protein powder (30g)

breakfast.name: Greek Yogurt Bowl
breakfast.portions: 1 cup Greek yogurt (200g), 1/2 cup berries (75g), 1 tbsp honey (20g)

breakfast.name: Avocado Toast
breakfast.portions: 2 slices whole grain bread (60g), 1/2 avocado (70g), 2 eggs (100g)

breakfast.name: Breakfast Smoothie
breakfast.portions: 1 banana (100g), 1 scoop protein powder (30g), 1 cup milk (240ml), 1 tbsp peanut butter (15g)

lunch.name: Chicken and Rice
lunch.portions: 6 oz chicken breast (170g), 1 cup cooked rice (185g)

lunch.name: Tuna Salad
lunch.portions: 1 can tuna (120g), 2 cups mixed greens (50g), 1 tbsp olive oil (15ml)

lunch.name: Quinoa Bowl
lunch.portions: 1 cup cooked quinoa (185g), 4 oz grilled chicken (115g), 1/2 avocado (70g)

lunch.name: Bean and Vegetable Soup
lunch.portions: 2 cups soup (480ml), 1 slice whole grain bread (30g)

dinner.name: Beef and Rice
dinner.portions: 6 oz lean beef (170g), 1 cup cooked rice (185g)

dinner.name: Chicken and Sweet Potato
dinner.portions: 6 oz chicken breast (170g), 1 medium sweet potato (150g)

dinner.name: Salmon with Roasted Vegetables
dinner.portions: 6 oz salmon fillet (170g), 2 cups mixed vegetables (200g)

dinner.name: Vegetarian Stir Fry
dinner.portions: 1 cup tofu (250g), 2 cups mixed vegetables (200g), 1 tbsp oil (15ml)

dinner.name: Turkey Meatballs with Pasta
dinner.portions: 5 oz turkey meatballs (140g), 1 cup cooked pasta (140g), 1/2 cup tomato sauce (125g)
